thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zhangjiagang Rural Commercial Bank Gets C.Bank's Approval To Issue Tier-2 Capital Bonds

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhangjiagang Rural Commercial Bank Gets C.Bank's Approval To Issue Tier-2 Capital Bonds

organizations.name: brief-zhangjiagang rural commercial bank gets c.bank
jiangsu zhangjiagang rural commercial bank co ltd

text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Jiangsu Zhangjiagang Rural Commercial Bank Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT GETS CENTRAL BANK'S APPROVAL TO ISSUE UP TO 1.5 BILLION YUAN ($233.16 million) TIER-2 CAPITAL BONDS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2B92R0b Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.4333 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
